metadata.title: Ocean Time Series Data of the Gulf of Alaska and Bering Sea by PMEL FOCI Program (PMEL EPIC)

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description:
This one-dimensional ocean data set indexed by time, includes ocean temperature, pressure, salinity, conductivity, etc. from the Gulf of Alaska and Bering Sea.  There are 975 files available for plotting and download.  Depth range was from -3 to 1322 meters deep.  Data were collected by the PMEL FOCI program, and the data are available through PMEL EPIC program.

  [PMEL - Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (http://www.pmel.noaa.gov/), FOCI - Fisheries-Oceanography Coordinated Investigations (http://www.pmel.noaa.gov/foci/home.html)]
metadata.notes:
